title: Apply fully-rounded (9999px) border radius to specified UI inputs and buttons

requirements.text: Update the Header search input to use a fully-rounded border radius equivalent to 9999px (e.g., Tailwind `rounded-full`) so the input appears pill-shaped in all responsive layouts.

quotes: can you make the border radius 9999px for the search input

acceptanceCriteria: On all pages where the Header is shown, the search input renders with a pill-shaped/fully-rounded border radius.
The updated border radius applies consistently in both light and dark themes.
The search input focus/hover styles still render correctly (no clipping or visual artifacts at the corners).

requirements.text: Update all buttons in the Header to use a fully-rounded border radius equivalent to 9999px (e.g., Tailwind `rounded-full`) so they appear pill-shaped across desktop and mobile header layouts.
acceptanceCriteria: All clickable button-style controls in `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` render with a fully-rounded/pill border radius.
No Header button regresses in spacing/alignment (icons and text remain centered).
Mobile header and desktop header both reflect the fully-rounded styling.

requirements.text: Update the 'Start a Pond' button on the All Ponds page to use a fully-rounded border radius equivalent to 9999px (e.g., Tailwind `rounded-full`).

quotes: the 'Start a Pond' button in the all ponds page

acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx`, the 'Start a Pond' button displays as fully-rounded/pill-shaped.
The button remains visually consistent with other primary actions (no loss of padding, font size, or hover/focus behavior).

requirements.text: Update the following buttons on the User Settings page to use a fully-rounded border radius equivalent to 9999px (e.g., Tailwind `rounded-full`): 'Save Changes', 'Save Froggy Phrase', and 'Choose Avatar'.

quotes: the save changes, save froggy phrase and choose avatar button in the user  settings page

acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx`, each of the three specified buttons renders with a fully-rounded/pill-shaped border radius.
Button disabled/loading states (if present) still look correct with the new border radius.
No other settings controls unintentionally change shape unless they are one of the specified buttons.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components instead).
nonGoals: Do not change any backend Motoko code or canister interfaces.
Do not redesign the overall layout, typography, or color system beyond the requested border-radius updates.
Do not change button labels, routing behavior, or feature logic related to ponds or user settings.
